nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Sharpshooter
Star Wars: Clone Wars: Sharpshooter is an online computer game released in June 2008 on StarWars.com as part of the campaign advertising the Clone Wars film.

It is a simple first person shooter in which the player plays a clone sharpshooter who is practicing on the shooting range, firing at holograms, droids and other targets. Hits earn the player points: head shots and mid torso shots are worth 10 points while any other hit is worth 5 points. If one shoots friendly targets, one loses points.
The game was followed up by Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Live Fire.
